lines.dialogue: Well, there we are. The most utilitarian of utilitarians - we could have used a very simplistic algorithm to replace your decisions. That would have saved a lot of development time. Although... Perhaps I'm being unfair, the situations so far have been quite specific. We're fairly to trolley to train based scenarios currently but... Maybe there's something I can whip up.
Clearly I'm going to have to up my game in order to catch you out. Buckle up, things are about to get complicated.
